extension.description: Little Tigre bridges TMDb Helper or any metadat addons to Stremio addons (Comet, Torrentio, MediaFusion, AIO Streams) with full anime support. Professional Router-Controller-Service architecture. Features: multi-debrid support (Real-Debrid, Torbox), Kitsu/MAL/AniList anime IDs, metadata persistence, color-coded streams, cached stream prioritization, smart filtering.
